title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 450.1 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 450.1 - Definitions

State Regulations

As used in this part: (a) Board shall mean the Drug Accountability Board established by Insurance Law section 202. (b) Bureau shall mean the Pharmacy Benefits Bureau established by this Part. (c) Chair shall mean the chair of the Drug Accountability Board appointed by the superintendent. Notes

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
